## ABOUT

# Plan Your Visit

For 90 years, the Visual Arts Center of New Jersey has been recognized as a leading arts institution in the tristate region, serving over 30,000 individuals each year. Comprised of a Studio School serving children, teens, and adults; a contemporary art museum; educational in-community programs serving K-12 schools; and art & healing programs in conjunction with health and social service organizations, the Art Center engages the community in visual learning, interpretive programs, and art-making experiences. Our facilities are easily accessible by car or train. Parking is available on site.

#### ____CONTACT

**Visual Arts Center of New Jersey**  
[68 Elm Street  
Summit, NJ 07901](https://goo.gl/maps/Zy57MzzkfJKrHaVy6)

908.273.9121  
[Info@artcenternj.org](mailto:Info@artcenternj.org)

#### ____HOURS

**BUILDING HOURS**

  * MONDAY–THURSDAY **9 AM–10 PM**
  * FRIDAY **9 AM–6 PM**
  * SATURDAY–SUNDAY **10 AM–5 PM**

**GALLERY HOURS**

  * MONDAY–THURSDAY **10 AM–8 PM**
  * FRIDAY **10 AM–5 PM**
  * SATURDAY–SUNDAY **11 AM–4 PM**

**BETWEEN SEMESTERS, HOURS MAY VARY**

_The Art Center’s Exhibition Galleries will be closed for New Year’s Eve and Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, and Thanksgiving; the Studio School and offices will be closed for additional holidays. View our calendar for holidays and other closings._...

## SUPPORT

# Membership

[PURCHASE A MEMBERSHIP](https://artcenternj.augusoft.net/index.cfm?fuseaction=1050)

Members like you allow the Visual Arts Center of New Jersey to be a cultural gem within our community. We are the state’s preeminent institution dedicated exclusively to showcasing, making, and learning about contemporary art.

Our members represent the heart and soul of all that we do. Be sure to check out these exciting new benefits for our members—one of the ways we show our appreciation for YOU!

[Haga clic aquí para leer la información de membresía en español.](https://www.artcenternj.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Translation-Membership.pdf)

**Basic Membership Includes:**

  * Unlimited free gallery admission
  * Eligibility for exhibition opportunities
  * Members-only tuition rate on Studio School classes
  * Discounted admission to selected special events and programs
  * Discounts on exhibition catalogs

**Please note:** You do not need a membership to take classes.

### Membership Committee

The Visual Arts Center of New Jersey’s Members Committee is looking for new candidates. The Members Committee’s mission is to provide opportunities for students and members to display their art to the public. The exhibits should showcase the quality and caliber of each participant’s work as well as provide a rewarding and festive experience for both the...
accessibility_text:
Accessibility[Brian Riley](https://www.artcenternj.org/author/briley/ "Posts by Brian Riley")2026-01-06T20:47:18+00:00

### Accessibility at the Art Center

The Art Center invites individuals and groups to take part in public events, participate in art classes, and attend exhibitions. The Art Center is proud to provide a range of accessibility tools in order to foster an inclusive environment where everyone can experience, make, and learn about art.

The Art Center can develop group curricula and individualized accommodations for visitors and students with visual impairments, autism, and age-related cognitive disorders like dementia. 

ADA-compliant website, including alt-tagged images for visitors with visual disabilities and additional accessibility functions, such as  
high contrast, adjustable type size, and plain text options.

Open captioning for public programs held on Zoom.

Sign language interpreters (with two weeks notice).

Braille (up to 10 pages with three days notice).

Assistive listening devices available for those who are deaf or hard of hearing.

Verbal descriptions as part of our exhibitions (upon request).

[**Click here**](https://www.artcenternj.org/wp-content/uploads/2026/01/VACNJ-Accessibility-Guide-Visual.pdf) to download a flyer detailing accessibility features at the Art Center.

Facilities are wheelchair accessible and a wheelchair is available on site for guest use. If an individual requires other special accommodations to assist with disabilities...

## OUR MISSION

# Visual Arts Center of New Jersey

The Visual Arts Center of New Jersey nurtures the capacity for personal expression, expands the creative experience, and fosters stronger communities by empowering people to see, make, and learn about art. Through exhibition, Studio School, and community programs, the Art Center engenders connection, curiosity, and creative risk-taking among its constituents.
